page.title: 09DANCING AND FETES
page.content: ON{MAY 1ST}THE CHILDREN OF MURSLEY 1ST SCHOOL DID SOME MAYPOLE DANCING,IN THE VILLAGE HALL AS IT WAS A WET AFTERNOON. ON{MAY 8TH}THERE WAS A FLOWER FESTIVAL.THIS EVENT WAS VISITED BY A GREAT MANY PEOPLE AND ALL THE CHILDREN AT THE SCHOOL IN MURSLEY TOOK PART IN MAYPOLE DANCING WHICH WAS HELD IN THE MAIN STREET BY THE CURCH AT THE TOP OF THE BEECHAMS,WITH A POLICE CONSTABLE ON DUTY TO STOP THE TRAFFIC. THE CHURCH FETE WAS ON{JUNE 8TH}AND AFTER IT WAS OPENED THE CHILDREN DANCED SOME COUNTRY DANCES. DURING THE SUMMER TERM HALF TERM THE CORONATION SPORTS WERE HELD AT THE RECREATION GROUND. {DRAYTON PARSLOW SCHOOL}ORGANISED A STRAWBERRY FAIR AND FOR THEIR CHAPEL ANNIVERSARY THEY COLLECTED MONEY.
